wildy_deck.name: King Black Dragon
wildy_deck.text: Once per turn, destroy any keeper of any time in play.

wildy_deck.name: Chaos Elemental
wildy_deck.text: Once per turn, send any keeper in play to that players hand.

wildy_deck.name: Chaos Fanatic
wildy_deck.text: Once per turn, send any keeper in play to that players hand.

wildy_deck.name: Burning Amulet
wildy_deck.text: Once per turn, teleport to wilderness and teleblock.

wildy_deck.name: Disarm
wildy_deck.text: The bosses of the wilderness who remove equipment from the player. |Chaos Elemental| and |Chaos Fanatic|.
